meanings.definition: Having been done or experienced before.
meanings.sent1: The forgone movie was one I had already seen.
meanings.sent2: The forgone day brought back memories of happier times.
meanings.sent3: The forgone ice cream cone left me feeling disappointed.
meanings.sent4: The forgone opportunity to travel abroad haunted her dreams.
meanings.sent5: The forgone birthday party was a distant memory.

meanings.sent1: The cat forgone the dog down the street.
meanings.sent2: The sun forgone the moon in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The student forgone the teacher to the classroom.
meanings.sent4: The river forgone the bridge on its journey.
meanings.sent5: The wind forgone the storm, warning of its arrival.
